string.text:
A Ukrainian heavy metal magazine written in Russian and published by Dark Arts Ltd. Inside, you’ll find exclusive interviews with bands such as DEICIDE, KORPIKLAANI, BLEED FROM WITHIN, DARK MILLENIUM, and many more, along with festival reports from events like Wacken and Black Sea Metal Fest. Though defunct since 2018, it’s still an enjoyable read and a great way to pass the time.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Passing Time

A Ukrainian heavy metal magazine written in Russian, featuring a glossy cover and professionally printed pages filled with original interviews from bands such as MOONSORROW, NIGHTRAGE, CALIBAN, BUTTERFLY TEMPLE, and many others. It also contains over 200 reviews covering the latest releases across all styles of heavy metal. An enjoyable read and a great way to pass the time.
 
 %c[pda_white]PROPERTIES:
 %c[d_cyan] • %c[pda_white] Recreational
 %c[d_orange] • %c[pda_white] Use: %c[ui_gray_2]Passing Time
